mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock_record (goods_id, operator_id, type, qty, remark, create_time) VALUES (#{goodId}, #{operatorId}, #{type}, #{qty}, #{remark}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, g.name AS goodsName, g.barcode AS barcode FROM stock_record r LEFT JOIN goods g ON r.goods_id = g.id ORDER BY r.create_time DESC
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(qty), 0) FROM stock_record WHERE type = 2 AND DATE(create_time) = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stock_record WHERE goods_id = #{goodsId}
SELECT r.*, g.name AS goodsName, g.barcode AS barcode FROM stock_record r LEFT JOIN goods g ON r.goods_id = g.id ORDER BY r.create_time DESC LIMIT 5
